area.name: cubicle
area.title: The Cubicle
area.description: The Cubicle is a small cafe with friendly workers and a mean liquor license.

item.description: These bar stools sure look comfortable.
item.title: A row of padded stools line the bar.
item.name: a bar stool

item.description: This couch looks awefully inviting. Maybe you should try it out.
item.title: A comfortable-looking couch sits against the wall.
item.name: a soft leather couch

room.description: You're standing in the lounge of the infamous Cubicle, a cafe and bar geared toward the technologically inclined. You could reach the street by leaving through the large glass doors to the south, or hit up the bar by going east.
room.name: The Cubicle Lounge
